mapper.sql: id, name, password, email, status, sex, address, city_id, city_name, phone, age, photo_url, law_office, introduction, create_date, update_date
mapper.select:
select
from lawyer where id in (select other_lawyer_id from lawyer_attention where lawyer_id = ${id}) limit (${pager.currentPage}-1)*pageSize,pageSize

select
distinct
from lawyer
order by ${orderByClause}
